Package com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project

Contains code related to the various map projections supported by the program.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Projector Interface that the different projection classes must implement Information on map projections can be found at: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Map_projection
 

Class Summary
AbstractProjector Abstract base class for projections
AzimuthProjection Azimuth Projection
ConicalProjection Conical Projection
GnomonicProjection Gnomonic projection
HeightfieldGenerator This class doesn't implemenent the Projector interface as it doesn't generate an image, instead it retains the raw height values.
MercatorProjection Does a mercator projection based on the generated planet
MollweideProjection Mollweide Projection
OrthographicProjection An orthographic projection of a planet
PetersProjection Peters projection
ProjectionConstants A class holding constant values used by the projections
ProjectionManager Class that manages a list of available projections.
SinusoidProjection Sinusoid Projection
SquareProjection A square projection
StereographicProjection A stereographic projection of the planet
 

Package com.alvermont.terraj.planet.project Description

Contains code related to the various map projections supported by the program.
